alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 9:47AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Will and southeastern Cook Counties through 1015 AM CST... At 947 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Homer Glen, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South side of Chicago, Hammond, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Lawn, Calumet City, Englewood, South Shore, Roseland, Chicago Lawn, Burbank, Lansing, Oak Forest, Harvey, Lockport, New Lenox, Homer Glen, Blue Island and Dolton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook
